definition: immature green soy beans, either still in the pod (edamame) or removed from the pod

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: An analytical method of imidacloprid residue in vegetable soybean by high-performance liquid chromatography(HPLC) was developed.
sentences.chinese: 采用高效液相色谱法测定毛豆中吡虫啉农药残留。

sentences.english: Edamame is a soybean that can be eaten either fresh or frozen.
sentences.chinese: 毛豆是一种既可以新鲜吃也可以冻存食用的大豆。

sentences.english: So, my bag from home take a handful of soybeans and soak in water.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我从家里的袋子里抓了一把毛豆，泡在水里。

sentences.english: You might also want to know that edamames have very low sodium content.
sentences.chinese: 也许你也想知道，毛豆的钠含量很低。

sentences.english: For fresh ones, blanch using salted water.
sentences.chinese: 新鲜毛豆用盐水焯一下。

sentences.english: Kinds of what? I thought, decided to types of soybeans.
sentences.chinese: 种什么呢？我想了想，决定种毛豆。

sentences.english: Wash and soak the green soy beans.
sentences.chinese: 毛豆洗干净后，浸泡在水中备用。

sentences.english: The person such as Yuhao and beans of young soya bean assumes the job that had to take care of Yang Fu actively.
sentences.chinese: 余好和毛豆豆等人主动承担起了照顾杨父的任务。

sentences.english: A handful of edamame, a little tofu in soup, is enough.
sentences.chinese: 汤里一把毛豆，一点豆腐就已经足够了。

sentences.english: Preying mantis made using pea pods and edamame.
sentences.chinese: 豌豆皮和毛豆做的螳螂。

definition: eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
